components.description:
A generic, high-rise office building. Generally found in cities, and most active during business hours.

The office building shown in Twemoji 2.0 is of Twitter HQ in San Fransisco.
components.title: Office Building

description:
A generic, high-rise office building. Generally found in cities, and most active during business hours.

The office building shown in Twemoji 2.0 is of Twitter HQ in San Fransisco.
title: Office Building

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Building and map symbols
emoji_net_data.definition: A generic, high-rise office building. Generally found in cities, and most active during business hours. The office building shown in Twemoji http://emojipedia.org/office-building/
emoji_net_data.name: office building

bn:00098342a: Above average in size or number or quantity or magnitude or extent
Of considerable or relatively great size or extent.
Of a great size; the weakest sense of great size.

bn:00084198v: Make by combining materials and parts
To create something by combining or assembling materials or parts or by changing it.
To form by combining materials or parts.
(transitive) to form by combining materials or parts.
To build or form (something) by assembling parts.
To form or formulate in the mind.

bn:00084317v: To make somebody busy, to keep busy with, to occupy, to make occupied.

bn:00087441v: Inhabit or live in; be an inhabitant of
To fill with people or supply with inhabitants.
To supply with inhabitants; to people.
To have permanent residence somewhere, to inhabit, to reside.
To plant with inhabitants; to colonize; to people.

bn:00001961n: Authority is power given by the state or by academic knowledge of an area.
Room where people perform their duties or a position within an organization
The label for the webpage where customers can access existing and create new online Office files using Office Web Apps.
Any room, set of rooms or building used for the administration of government service, business transactions or other work related activities.
One who is accepted as a source of reliable information on a subject.
The word authority can be used to mean power given by the state or by academic knowledge of an area.
A person accepted as a source of reliable information on a subject.

An office is generally a room or other area where administrative work is done, but may also denote a position within an organization with specific duties attached to it ; the latter is in fact an earlier usage, office as place originally referring to the location of one's duty.
A bureau, an administrative unit of government.

A government or state agency, often an appointed commission, is a permanent or semi-permanent organization in the machinery of government that is responsible for the oversight and administration of specific functions, such as an intelligence agency.
A department or other administrative unit of a government; also, the office or headquarters of, or the district administered by such unit of government.

bn:00044044n: Tower consisting of a multistoried building of offices or apartments
Any tall, multistoried structure or edifice that is equipped with elevators.
A tall building, one of many stories.
An apartment building in which each apartment is individually wholly owned and the common areas are jointly owned.
A tower block, high-rise, residential towers, apartment tower, office tower, apartment block, or block of flats, is a tall building or structure used as a residential and/or office building.
A building which is neither high- nor low-rise

bn:00013722n: A building, esp. one of large size or imposing appearance.
A structure that has a roof and walls and stands more or less permanently in one place
Closed structure with walls and a roof.
A building is a man-made structure with a roof and walls standing more or less permanently in one place.
Structure with a roof and walls, such as a house or factory.
A closed structure with walls and a roof.
A building; a structure; an architectural fabric, especially an imposing one; a large or fine building, public or private.
Man-made structure with a roof and walls standing more or less permanently in one place
A building to which there is free access by the public and which is available for the use of a community.

bn:00080386n: Vertical structure, usually solid, that defines and sometimes protects an area
Each of the substantial structures acting either as the exterior of or divisions within a structure.
A vertical construction made of stone, brick, wood, etc., with a length and height much greater than its thickness, used to enclose, divide or support.
Permanent, substantial side or division in a building.
An architectural partition with a height and length greater than its thickness; used to divide or enclose an area or to support another structure
A wall is a structure that defines an area, carries a load, or provides shelter or security.

bn:00058689n: A building containing offices where work is done
Commercial building containing spaces for offices.
A commercial building containing spaces for offices.

bn:00004836n: Self-contained housing unit that occupies only part of a building. It may be owned or rented.
A complete domicile occupying only part of a building.
A suite of rooms usually on one floor of an apartment house
A self-contained housing unit that occupies only part of a building
Domicile occupying part of a building.
An apartment or a flat is a self-contained housing unit that occupies only part of a building.

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the office building emoji is rendered with a sophisticated, modern architectural style, featuring smooth, rounded edges and realistic glass facades that catch subtle, soft lighting. Its muted, professional color palette and precise detailing convey a sense of corporate presence and productivity. This emoji on Apple devices is perfect for symbolizing work, business, or professional environments.
